Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a three-run homer in the ninth inning to win the game for the Mets
Post-Match Reflections: Pete Alonso expressed his desire to contribute positively to the team
Steve Cohen expressed excitement about the team's victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets won their first postseason series since 2015
The Mets will play the Philadelphia Phillies in the NLDS starting on Saturday
Others: Jose Quintana pitched six shutout innings for the Mets
David Peterson got the final three outs for the Mets
The Mets were held to two hits over the first eight innings
